mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Userfeestate VALUES ( #{accountId}, #{date}, 90, (SELECT ap.teamno FROM Appoint AS ap INNER JOIN Account AS ac ON ap.AccountId = ac.AccountId WHERE ac.accountId LIKE #{accountId} + '%') )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM UserFeeState WHERE AccountId=#{accountId} and Date=#{date} ORDER BY date

select a.AccountNm, s.accountid,c.CommonName, s.date, s.state from account as a inner join userfeestate as s on a.accountId = s.accountid inner join CommonCode as c on c.ClassCode = 'Position' and c.CommonCode = a.tpPosition where date like #{date} + '%' order by s.date desc
select a.AccountNm, s.accountid, s.date, s.state from account as a inner join userfeestate as s on a.accountId = s.accountId where a.accountId = #{accountId} order by s.date desc
